articles.author: Brandon Specktor
articles.title: Halley's Comet begins its return journey to Earth Saturday - Livescience.com
articles.description: Halley's Comet is predicted to reach its farthest point from the sun on Dec. 9, beginning a 38-year journey toward Earth that culminates in 2061.
articles.content:
After zooming away from Earth for nearly 40 years, Halley's Comet is about to turn tail and head back our way — setting the stage for a spectacular close-up in 2061.
On Saturday, Dec. 9, the famous … [+2361 chars]

articles.title: Six French teenagers convicted in connection to beheading of school teacher - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: The murder of history teacher Samuel Paty shocked France and fuelled contentious debates about freedom of expression.
articles.content:
A French court has convicted six teenagers in connection with the 2020 beheading of history teacher Samuel Paty, whose murder shocked the country.
